protected.title: Protected Content
protected.description: This content is password protected. A password is required to view it.

share.encryptedMessage: Content is encrypted. You need to decrypt it before sharing.

modal.description: This content is password protected. Enter the password to view it.

writeTag.title: Write NFC Tag
writeTag.description: Use the button below to write this data to a new NFC tag.

storageLimit.title: Storage Limit Reached
storageLimit.message: Free users have reached the storage limit. New scans will overwrite the oldest records. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited storage.
storageLimit.subtitle: Get unlimited storage with Premium subscription.
